title: OpenAI to start testing ChatGPT connectors for Google Drive and Slack
body: OpenAI will soon begin testing a way for business customers to connect apps like Slack and Google Drive to ChatGPT.

title: OpenAI to test 'ChatGPT connectors' for external apps
body: OpenAI will soon launch a beta test of a feature called 'ChatGPT Connectors' that will let businesses link ChatGPT to Slack and Google Drive.
